attributes.action: Bring English law in line to that in Scotland for a minimum distance of 2kms between wind farms and places of habitation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The effects of wind turbines situated closer than 2kms on the health,wellbeing and quality of life is now becoming apparent all over the world. No minimum distances for these developments exist in England. In Scotland a minimum distance of 2kms is in place. Currently developments in England are being proposed down to 400 meters of properties. This cannot be acceptable

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to bring English law in line to that in Scotland for a minimum distance of 2kms between wind farms and places of habitation.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=stopwindfarms


Her Majesty's Government
